00047 #ifndef MODEL_DIRECTOR_H_
00048 #define MODEL_DIRECTOR_H_
00049 
00050 #include "Model_Builder.h"
00051 #include "Model.h"
00052 
00053 //!The Director class of the Builder pattern
00054 /**
00055  * Simple steps: Use the builder to
00056  * 1. Create Refiner
00057  * 2. Create a pipeline of filters to perform the
00058  *    various refinements defined by the Refiner
00059  * 3. Create a strategy to execute the pipeline of filters
00060  * 4. Execute the strategy
00061  * 5. Return the model inside the builder that has been refined
00062  *    by the strategy
00063  */
00064 class Model_Director {
00065 public:
00066     Model_Director();
00067     virtual ~Model_Director();
00068 
00069     Model& build_model(Model_Builder& builder);
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif /* MODEL_DIRECTOR_H_ */
